title: Lovingly Restored Vintage 4rm, 1 BR Non-Smoking
posting_body: Lincoln Square / Arcadia Terrace.
Close to Andersonville.
Non-
Smoking.
Rent includes heat, water, hot water.
You pay electricity and cooking gas only!
Sunny and bright top third floor apartment.
Lovingly restored vintage 4 RM, 1BR in Non-Smoking building.
Remodeled Kitchen with large cabinets, newer appliances, Updated bath, refinished oak flooring and beautifully refinished Mahogany Doors throughout.
LR features large Stained Glass bay windows and a built-in bookcase.
Formal Dining room.
Bedroom has a large, organized closet.
Updated electric, newer lighting fixtures, intercom security; cable-ready (fiber optic area), new Energy Star windows.
Clean, quiet, non-smoking building features large, beautifully landscaped yard w/ patio, large stone fountain, birdbath and  accent ground lighting.
Laundry on premises.
Large storage shed provided.
Garage space with remote and pin-pad available on wait list.
Great tenants and neighbors.
No dogs allowed.
Excellent area close to bicycle/walking paths, Tennis courts.
New City of Chicago Nature Trail w/ reflection pond just 4 blocks away!
Tony's Fresh Super Market, Starbucks, many interesting cafes, pubs and restaurants nearby.
Close to Lincoln Square and Andersonville.
No smokers.
No dogs allowed.
All references & credit will be carefully checked.
Credit score of 700+ required!
IF YOUR CREDIT IS BAD DON'T BOTHER TO CALL.
For further info or showing you must call Ray at (773) 315-6490
